lead_paragraph: An undercover federal agent attended training exercises with the Hutaree militia for at least eight months before nine of its members were arrested last weekend, prosecutors said.
snippet: An undercover federal agent attended training exercises with the Hutaree militia for at least eight months before nine of its members were arrested last weekend, prosecutors said.

headline.main: U.S. Agent Infiltrated Militia, Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Agent Infiltrated Militia, Lawyer Says
